name: 42wizard
description: 42Wizard is a tool accessible via Discord (Discord BOT) that allows 42 students in Paris to be notified when they are about to be deloggable via Discord (and by mail, if the option is enabled).

scripts.restart: pm2 flush 42Wizard && pm2 reload 42Wizard && pm2 logs 42Wizard

author: MurasakiNX (mel-habi)
